attributes.action: It is time for a second public referendum about Brexit!
attributes.additional_details:
* Freedom of Movement will still exist between Southern and Northern Ireland! Therefore, this would still mean Freedom of Movement between the U.K. and the EU!
* The "Leave" Campaigners used false information in the last referendum!
* The £40 billion the Tories have already agreed to pay the EU to leave, will mean further massive cuts to all public services e.g. NHS, Education, Police etc!
* Many international companies will move out of the UK causing more unemployment and higher prices on their products!
* In order to attract new investments, the U.K. may well become even more of a "Tax Haven" country than it is now!
* Large areas of the UK who voted against Brexit in 2016 (e.g. Scotland and Greater London) feel angry!
attributes.background: Even those who originally voted to leave the European Union are now totally fed up with the absolute chaos of the current negotiations and what it will mean to us if it goes ahead!
